description: Each OAM file contains shapes, images, and other content, as well as a timeline for playing the animation the file contains. Users can create OAM files by publishing from an Edge Animate project ( .AN file). Users can also export OAM files from Adobe Animate, Adobe Flash, and other animation applications.
